reviewText: Thomas & his friends Have loads of adventures. Now, their favourite Christmas advenures Have been put on 1 tape! The stories include Snow, Terence The Tractor, Special funnel, Thomas & Percy's Christmas adventure, Thomas & The missing Christmas Tree & Thomas' Christmas party. There are also some really exciting special features Like The "Connect the dots" game.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This, I believe, was the second holiday Thomas release. At the time it was a great video but now, you don't need it. It only had 1 new story, Snow, where Rusty tells Thomas the story of Skarloey and the worst winter of all. It also has a new music video entitled "The Snow Song" which was good and now, that is pretty much the only reason to purchase this video. So this video wasn't all that exciting when it came out since it only has one new story. I've said this once and I'm gonna say it again, if you want a good holiday video, buy Thomas' Snowy Surprise.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is another great children's film in the Thomas series.  The title is a little misleading because the stories don't have a lot to do with Christmas, although there are allusions to the holidays throughout.  It has more to do with winter, and more specifically snow.The little engines have to deal with snowdrifts and avalanches, and in typical fashion, they are frequently buried by snow and crash into it with frowns and rolling eyes.  The sets are beautifully decorated for winter and the snow looks very realistic.  The narration by Alec Baldwin and George Carlin (now that's an interesting pair) is first rate.This is a wonderful addition to your child's Thomas collection.  If he/she doesn't have a Thomas collection, it is a good place to start.
summary: Little engines covered with snow in a winter wonderland
Title: N/A

reviewerName: Janet Boyer "Snowland Deck and Coffee Tarot C...
reviewText: I bought this DVD 2 years ago, and my son really enjoys it. We didn't have any holiday episodes on his other videos, so this was all new to him.The storyteller is George Carlin and features these stories:*Snow*Thomas' Christmas Party*Thomas and the Missing Christmas Tree*Terence the Tractor*Thomas and Percy's Christmas Adventure*Special FunnelThe bonus features are:*Thomas and the Missing Christmas Tree Read Along Story (I often put this on repeat since the story is so short. My son really enjoys it.)*Connect-the-dots Christmas gaem*Bios of the characters*The Snow Song sing-along*Links to a website*Bonus CD sampler (very short)The run-time is about 42 minutes for everything.My son doesn't play the games, but he enjoys the read-along-story and episodes.This is a good holiday DVD for fans of Thomas and friends, in my opinion, but if you own the other holiday stories (except for "Snow"), you may not find much new in this DVD.
summary: Christmas At The Island of Sodor

reviewText: i give this video 4 stars only because of alec baldwin's vocalizations for james (i wrote about this in my thomas the tank engine "make someone happy" review)--it is distracting in this video, versus inappropriate in the other. the snow song is wonderful; really this is a delightful christmas or holiday time video. my son absolutely loves it.
summary: my son would give this 5 stars, but i give it 4.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Snow is the only new episode one this video. It talked about a time where Skarloey got stuck in a snowstorm. The other two Christmas episodes are good but they sre on Thomas's Christmas Party. Also one of the episodes is really Thomas and Percy's Mountain Aventure not Christmas adventure considering it's about Thankgiving. Special Funnel is only on this one because there's snow on the ground in it. Terence the Tractor was in the first tape and it also was on just because snow was on the ground in it. I was very disappointed with this tape and if I were you I would just buy Thomas's Snowy Suprise.
summary: One new episode doesn't quailfy for a new tape
